channel.title: CVE Feed for Yokogawa Rental & Lease Corporation -- Unifier
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Yokogawa Rental & Lease Corporation -- Unifier

item.title: CVE-2024-23847|2024-05-31T06:11:15.428Z -- Yokogawa Rental & Lease Corporation -- Unifier
item.description: Incorrect default permissions issue exists in Unifier and Unifier Cast Version.5.0 or later, and the patch "20240527" not applied. If this vulnerability is exploited, arbitrary code may be executed with LocalSystem privilege. As a result, a malicious program may be installed, data may be modified or deleted.

item.title: CVE-2024-36246|2024-05-31T06:11:22.238Z -- Yokogawa Rental & Lease Corporation -- Unifier
item.description: Missing authorization vulnerability exists in Unifier and Unifier Cast Version.5.0 or later, and the patch "20240527" not applied. If this vulnerability is exploited, arbitrary code may be executed with LocalSystem privilege. As a result, a malicious program may be installed, data may be modified or deleted.
